message/new:
Don't forget this smell.
An orc's approach is betrayed by their stench.
message/old:
この臭いを忘れるな
オークの接近は臭いでわかる

message/new: In time, your nose will grow accustomed to it.
message/old: いつか鼻がバカになるだろうが――

message/new:
Though if you can survive that long,
an orc will be as a trifling foe.
message/old:
その頃まで生きのびていれば
オークごときにやられることはない

グリッテン砦だ
走るぞ

message/new:
Come along now,
afore the orcs can make their retreat!
message/old:
急いで――
ほら、オークちゃんが逃げちゃうよ！
